name: Locust Pocus
description:
Ravage the landscape with 20 million locusts! Consume as much vegetation as you can before your swarm dies of starvation. 

Created for ScoreSpace x 8 Bits to Infinity - Arcade Controls Jam.  

Joystick - Numpad                               One Button - SPACE

An Act of Mercy - There's also a MUTE button. It is an exception to the Arcade Controls Only requirement and its graphic was created outside the jam time, but I decided to include it because the music is sooooo irritating.
